## Gene Details:
- **MSU gene ID:** [LOC_Os03g27610](http://rice.uga.edu/cgi-bin/ORF_infopage.cgi?orf=LOC_Os03g27610)  
- **RAPdb gene ID:** [Os03g0393900](https://rapdb.dna.affrc.go.jp/locus/?name=Os03g0393900)  
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>OsMATL</u>
- **Genome:**  [MSU7](http://rice.uga.edu/),&nbsp;&nbsp;[IRGSP-1.0](https://rapdb.dna.affrc.go.jp/download/irgsp1.html)
- **Species:** *Oryza sativa*

## Functional Descriptions:
   - **OsMATL** mutation induces haploid seed formation in indica rice.

## Function-related keywords:
   - [seed](/tags/seed/)

## Literature:
   - [OsMATL mutation induces haploid seed formation in indica rice](https://www.doi.org/10.1038/s41477-018-0193-y).&nbsp;&nbsp;DOI:&nbsp;&nbsp;[10.1038/s41477-018-0193-y](https://www.doi.org/10.1038/s41477-018-0193-y);&nbsp;&nbsp;PMID:&nbsp;&nbsp;[29988153](https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/29988153/)
